# Arachne
Arachne are a race whose upper body resembles a humanoid's, while their lower body resembles a gigantic spider.
## Diet
- They are innate bloodfeeders, and derive thirst, nourishment, and health restoration from drinking blood of any kind (except their own).
## Benefits - They cannot be slipped. - They move faster compared to a human. - They take less damage from barotrauma (extreme pressure differences). - They can control their movement in zero-gravity environments.
## Special - Capable of spinning silk, producing webs, and wrapping victims in cocoons. They can also suck the blood out of a cocooned victim.
## Drawbacks - Their demonic blood is quenching and slightly alcoholic, but regenerating it causes rapid dehydration. It cannot be restored by iron. - They cannot wear shoes or full-body protective gear, such as hardsuits.
